name: Death of Smog
description:
In a near dystopian future where companies and smog have taken over the planet.
It is now up to a few resistance members to save the planet they live on.

You find yourself on a mission for the resistance in one of the many big cities around the planet. But the mission didn't go as smoothly as you expected. The corporationsecurity found out about your plans. Now you are the last surviving member of your team and it's up to you to complete the mission.

This is a 2.5D adventure story game made by 3 game students

Credits:

Jay Rohkea

Robert Stefanov

Adam Andersson
